```{r}
library(prepackR)

# Load gapminder data set
df <- gapminder::gapminder

# Scale gdpPercap
df_scaled <- stdizer(df,"gdpPercap", method = "mean_sd")

# Split dataset into train and test sets
splited_lst <- splitter(X=df_scaled, target_index=2, split_size=0.2, seed=1)
```
